name: Billy Jordan
text: Servpro was awesome. Came out quickly and got our crawl space dried within hours. Recommend them to anybody who needs something done right.

name: Heather McCormick
text:
Do not use this company whatever you do. I had my  rental house flood and it was the worst experience of my life using Serve Pro of Tuscaloosa.I had to call them 3-5 times to even go to the house to get the clean up  process started.Kept being told they was going out to start and when contractors went to give me estimates on repairs there would be no one at the house working on the clean up.They have lied to me several times about my property.Told me several different start and finish dates.They left drying fans in my house 7 days running after they had already cut the drywall and  insulation out. Drew one of the sales guys made up stories about the situation, told my tenant I had told him things when I hadn't even talked to the guy yet and told two different things ones to me and my tenant .I asked Drew why he did this and let him know I would be calling the office and  he proceeded to call my tenant a couple of times and send me a  6 page text over the situation which I found very unprofessional . When I called to complain about this Jacob the owners son took  up for the actions, was rude to me, did not listen to me and acted like I was bothering him.I was told my cabinets needed replaced when they did not. They pulled the vanity out of my master bathroom that did not need pulled out to begin with  without cutting the caulk and when they pulled the vanity it caused the mirror in the bathroom to fall on the sink shattering my mirror and busting my sink in the bathroom and tried to blame it on the heat in the room.I called  David the head of the construction department several times asking a start date and was told no repairs would be started  until they had 18 thousand upfront, Half the cost, and to ask my adjuster to call  his cooperate office and have Fed Ex deliver it to them.I asked my adjuster about it and he said that they did not that money upfront and was beyond shocked I had been told that.They still have their little lock box on my door a week after I told them I will not be using their services anymore, I have called four times to ask to have removed.I have called and asked  three times to speak to the owner of the franchise and got no response. The office staff is not friendly, they have horrible attitudes and make you feel  brushed off.  Brandy the girl in the office is very rude and  blows me off and acts like I'm a bother to her when I call to ask to speak to a manager or owner  . This is the most unprofessional company I have ever came into contact with in my life. And I strongly suggest people think  twice before using them for any reason. You will regret it if you  use this company, trust me on that.They thought since it was an insurance claim they would  take me for a run and rob me and  my insurance company blind and have caused me nothing  but a headache and  added stress from what happened to my home.

Chelsea
don't know how to reply to you  but this way. I too have a  job. Cant answer my phone if I'm busy.I have been trying to contact the owner since June 1st regarding all my issues when they first began.Have called several times .Today is June 20 and first attempt to be reached out to by the owner. You need  new office staff and employees that don't lie to customers and be extremely rude to them. I want my sink and my mirror replaced that was broken courtesy of your employees negligence. Thank you.

resp.text: Good morning Heather, I am deeply sorry you have not had a good experience talking with our staff. I have notified the owner, when we received your yelp review also. It looks like he tried to call about 9:00 am this morning. Please feel free to reach out at any time or email us at servpro8822@servprooftuscaloosa.com. The office has been directed to patch you through to him direct, if he is in during our office hours 8am-5:00 pm. I will follow up with him this afternoon to try and reach you again. I apologize for your less than ideal customer experience during this event in your home. The owner and I would be happy to work with you to figure out where communication errors started and how we can correct them in the future.  - Chelsea

name: Tammy
text:
They were all very sweet and helpful when they came out to our house for a house fire. But then everything got very confusing. We didn't know what was going to happen or when. Then they came in and packed all of our things up, first our clothes and no one told us to keep out any clothes. So we had no clothes blankets or pillows by the time they finished. There was 2 rooms that just had to be cleaned but they threw out our beds and furniture and took out all the carpet. We put notes on two closets and put don't enter.. I found the notes in the floor when we returned. They packed up everything and took it with them but nothing was cleaned it was just in the box they had packed it in.
They told us they we're going to clean the duck work, it was not cleaned, the ceiling fans were not cleaned nor were the blinds. We have had to just  about replace everything  we own plus we had use or own  money to eat at the hotel for   for over 2 months. Being nice is great but we had to many people telling us different things..it took a month after we got to come home before they started bring things back. It made difficult to cook. We had to buy new pots just fry an egg.
When they finally brought things back they were very confused about everything because the young guy and 3 woman that packed us up were fired. They didn't seem to know what was ours and what wasn't.  There are quite a few things missing.  Some of the items are antique and can't be replaced.  The thing is these items problem  went to someone else  and they just saw it was old and not there's. Maybe I need to go check the thrift store.  I didn't think this was going to be easy but this has been a nightmare. I have items that have tags on them, but they didn't take them or clean them. My blinds still have soot on them and it is not easy to clean. They we're supposed to clean and check or duct work , not even touched. And we saw the check our insurance sent them and that was way too much for this mess. This is the first time in 15 years we have made a claim on our house or auto  and now State Farm will not cover our house anymore. So we are going to have to sale our house and move because this put us in the red.

resp.text:
Tammy, I am so sorry for your bad experience with our crews. This is the first we have heard of any issue with your loss. We are trying to look into it internally, but would love for you to call the office at 553-8377 and let us know more so that we can get this issue resolved and make sure everything met to your satisfaction. - Chelsea

Tammy, Thank you for editing your review so that we may have a little insight on why you are unhappy with SERVPRO. I would like to also thank you for your kind words on our crews being "sweet and helpful." I can address that clothing and other textiles were cleaned by another company and not by SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. We would like you to reach out to our General Manager and Owner at 205-553-8377 when you are comfortable and allow us to address and mend your concerns that we do have control over. Any issues between the claim and your insurance provider will have to be handled through their customer service, as our company does not have direct correlation between your insurance coverage. Again, we are sorry for the headache that was truly in control of our Franchise and the General Manager/Owner would, again, invite you to call and see how we can clear up confusion and give us the opportunity to fix what we are able to.

name: Christina Graham
text:
Please consider this review a PSA! Do NOT use this place. Perhaps if you are a corporate client, they will do well on your job. If you are individual customer, they likely will perform extremely poorly.

I was lied to on a couple of different occasions with my job, in particular about them contacting my insurance and the times that they did so. They typically arrived late (45 min to 1 hour) or on one occasion, they were so late that I was told to not even bother waiting. This was actually after being told by the person managing my job (supposedly managing it) that he thought they were finished up at my place. NOPE! Even after officially signing off that they were done, I brought in another mitigation company...and they are currently finishing the job that ServPro was hired to do.

There are major breaks in communication internally, as well as externally. I wouldn't recommend this company to my worst enemy. Please don't use them and keep them in business any longer.

resp.text: Christina, this is deeply disturbing news to read. We did not know you had any concerns during your experience with SERVPRO of Tuscaloosa. Our office deeply apologizes for your additional distress in your experience with our crews. Residential claims are very important to us as well and we strive to do our best whether we are in a residential home or commercial business. We are very sorry you feel you did not receive our best. Our owners and management are actively investigating your claim file and you will hear from us directly with more questions and information soon. We want to make sure you are taken care of properly and wish that we had known throughout the job process that you were unhappy with the crew in your home.

resp.text: I apologize Kelyin. We do not have any records of you with our franchise. Please reach out to our customer service email servpro8822@servprooftuscaloosa.com or call 205-553-8377. We would love to hear more about your concerns and how we can rectify the situation.

text: Servpro of Tuscaloosa is the quickest to respond to any type of restoration need you may have.  They're fast and friendly. They do it all, fire, water damage, smoke, cleanup.   Call Justin or Chris 339-5022, they'll take care of you!!!!

name: Wes Graff
text: These people are basically crooks. I had an incident with a customer involving a drain line that leaked into the floor overnight and made a mess. I went out to see the damage myself before we called servpro out to clean it up. It was very minimal water on the floor. The only reason I didn't clean it up myself is because I didn't have a shop vac on my truck and thought it shouldn't cost more than a few hundred dollars to get it cleaned up, even though it was on the weekend, because there just honestly was very little that needed to be done. I was wrong. They charged me over a thousand dollars to do almost nothing besides vacuum up a small amount of water. Then on top of that they left their water bucket in the hallway over the weekend. It leaked water into the stairwell and ruined some of my clients ceiling tiles. When confronted about this Servpro management said that their bucket doesn't leak and that they were not going to replace the tiles. Please do not contact Servpro, they will take advantage of you on every turn.

name: LP
text: Professional Staff!  Very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: amy bentley
text: Can't say enough about the professionalism and service we received from ServPro in Tuscaloosa. Would highly recommend!

name: Thomas Billups
text:
My experience with Servpro of Tuscaloosa has been a nightmare for me and my family.
My 84 years old mother who suffers from Parkinson has been hurt more by Servpro of Tuscaloosa than by the tornado that damaged her home earlier in the year.
My parents used Servpro to store furniture and electronics in order to cleanup and rebuild after the tornado. Furniture stored with Servpro was returned broken, damaged and electronic items like televisions and a crystal chandelier are missing. Six months after they were paid by the insurance company and four months after returning the damaged items Servpro owner Don Elmore has yet to make things right. They are so eager to drum up new customers that they don’t service their current customers. Their customer service stinks.

name: J.R. Cunningham
text:
Worst experience of a lifetime. Lost valuable jewelry, broke a tv, scarred furniture. I asked for them to pay for the things. The answer from Kevin Driggers was, "Mr. Cunningham don't wait for a check from us, if we paid every complaint we'd go broke."
That is about the only true statement I heard from ServPro. They are not members of BBB.
The owner Don Elmore's final word to me were, "just sue me, sue me, I have insurance, sue me."
In my opinion I would never again allow my insurance  company to employ this business, nor could I recommend anything good about them.

name: Carl Noland
text: Ok

name: Mona Hardy
text: Nice

name: A Friend
text: The Serv Pro crew did an excellent job. They were professional and very courteous. Arrived on time and cleaned up when they finished. The entire experience was very good. I highly recommend them to anyone needing this type of service.

name: Dominique Vickers
text: Ms. Jennie is hands down the best! She walks you through every inch of the process to make sure you have a complete understanding. Very professional and hands on! Highly recommend!

name: Mark Strong
text: Let me start by saying that this is the first time IN MY LIFE that I’ve written a bad review about a business, so the fact I feel strongly enough about this matter to do so should say enough in and of itself. Based off my family’s (ongoing) experience to-date with Servpro of Montgomery, I cannot and would not recommend this business to anyone. Mr./Mrs. Brooks, I kindly ask that you or someone in charge reach out to me in a timely manner.  As a courtesy and to give you a chance to address the issue, I will refrain from posting detailed information of surrounding incidents and the lack of professionalism and timeliness your company has exhibited thus far.  If I do not hear from anyone in a timely manner I will have to share my story in order to help future people hopefully never have to deal with the same issue(s).

resp.text:
Hi, Mark, I am the General Manager, and I am terribly sorry to hear about your family’s experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Kerry Brooks

name: Lashanda Gaines
text: The entire staff was helpful. There wasn’t a doubt that I wouldn’t be taken care of. They were swift, efficient and thorough during this time.

name: Linda Ross
text: The Servpro representatives worked tirelessly to locate all the water damage and begin the drying out process.  They were professional and friendly, always answering my questions explaining each step as they were worked.  I highly recommend them!

name: Kelsea Garrett
text:
I’m at a loss for words as I write this review, but am hopeful that what happened to our family doesn't happen to someone else.

My grandmother had a horrible fall that was devastating to her life. My  Dad trying to do everything he could in that moment to comfort family took a beautiful handmade silk pastel Turkish area rug to have cleaned.

With loss of family in that moment you don't think clearly especially when it's unexpected.  The rug was dropped off; there was no proof of receipt provided at the time.

The rug is no where to be found and because there was no receipt provided no proof we were told nothing can be done.

Being the price of the rug and sentimental value alone we hired an attorney to contact the store owner, and unfortunately were told there was no proof.

I hope nobody else ever has to have the same experience. Please be sure if dropping off a high ticket item regardless of the emotional state you may be in to get an exchange of a paper trail, the employee’s name, and would even add to take pictures. Beyond disappointed in how the owners have handeled this situation with no effort at all to make any attempt for a resolution.

resp.text: SERVPRO® of Montgomery is sorry to hear of the traumatic experience you and your family have suffered. Knowing what you have been through, it saddens us to know that you feel we have mishandled one of your family heirlooms. As stated in your review, there is no paperwork showing it was delivered to us for cleaning. We value our customers and enforce stringent protocols and procedures for any items entrusted to us. This helps to avoid any confusion or loss. I would like to personally investigate this matter but will need additional information to do so. Please contact our office at 334-284-1612 and ask for Kerry Brooks.

name: Cassie Spears
text: Wish I could give y'all 10 stars!! SUPER prompt, SUPER professional, efficient, effective, and just all around amazing! Ms. Jennie in the office, you have my sincerest thanks! Y'all dispatched an incredible team! God forbid I ever have to have a COVID cleaning again, but if I do, I know who to call!!

name: Amanda Geddie
text: Very great company to hire !!!!!! They were clean and very professional during the whole process!!! Best you can get !!!

name: Dean S
text:
Do you own an older home? You might want to remove the built up dust in your heating/cooling ductwork.
ServPro is an expert cleaning service and the cost of duct cleaning is very reasonable.The technicians, Lamont and Shine showed up promptly at 9AM as scheduled and completed the cleaning in about 4 hours.
Now, the dust on the grilles is gone and air quality has improved. We are very pleased with this firm.Their technicians are thorough and professional.

name: Thomas Gaughran
text: Austin and Jon did an excellent job.

resp.text: Great to hear, we strive to please!

name: Linda Finney
text: The adjuster was very prompt coming to see damage. I was pleased and look forward to hearing start date.

name: Judy Van Luchene
text:
Several days after the house was empty, we stopped to see the progress...nothing.  For two weeks, we checked every
day, no workmen.  We were assured we would be back in by Christmas.  We went through three Project Managers, and
three different set of drywall and painters.  The first painting crew stood on my washer and dryer to paint the
ceiling in the laundry leaving dents and scratches.  We had stored the liquor from our bar in tubs in the garage,
as Servpro would not remove alcohol from the home.  Apparently the painters had found it and consumed a great deal
before they were removed from the job by Darin Ingle.  They also got paint all over our floors so Servpro brought
in commercial scrubbers which removed the finish on all of our floors.

To shorten this story, I will cut to the return home.  We finally returned to our home in early March with work still
going on, Painting and damaged floors. The first night home the water under the sink of my brand new cabinets
flooded the kitchen.  They had to send in dryers and a plumber who said it was not hooked up correctly and
reworked all of the kitchen dishwasher and sink plumbing. They sent in a professional flooring company  to assess
the floors. Their solution required us to move back into a hotel for at least a week so they could clean, reseal
the tile and recolor the grout.

The only thing that saved this project was Darin Ingle who arrived on the project in February.  Darin was sent in from another state to resolve the
problems at the Montgomery location that included our home.  Darin took the reins, brought in new crews and came
every day to ensure the work got back on track and that it was done correctly.  Darin's arrival was months into
the project and while we have never sued anyone, we were on the verge of doing just that to get another company
to come in so we could go home.  I am not sure if Servpro's executives realize that Darin not only saved our project,
saved them from a lawsuit but did an amazing job saving their reputation.  I would only call them again if Darin Ingle handled the job.
Because of Darin, I am giving Servpro a 2 star rating and Darin a 5.

An update to my review.  I was contacted by Mr. Bowen, an owner.  Mr. Bowen was determined to do something to do something for All we had been through.  He offered to send in a crew or something.  While his offer was appreciated, we had already fixed many of the issues and did not feel we could ensure another work crew I agreed to think it over and get back with him.  The one thing, as I explained to him, that distressed me everytime I went into the laundry was the dents and scratches on the tops of the washer and dryer which he eagerly agreed to replace.  With much of manufacturing shut down for long periods, appliances are in short supply.  However, Mr. Bowen and Darin Ingle were able to replace order And have new ones installed.  My frustration is no longer renewed when I walk into my laundry room.  My thanks to Mr. Bowen for reaching out and making this a better experience, and to Darin Ingle for making it happen.  It is good to know they cared to make things better.

resp.text:
Hi Judy, I am one of the owners and I am terribly sorry to hear about your experience. We try to maintain the highest standards of service, but clearly that is not what happened here. Please call me at 334-284-1612 at your convenience. I'd like to know what I can do to make things right. If you need anything else please let me know.

Thank you,
Bruce Bowen

name: Jennifer Needham
text: DO NOT USE THEM FOR TILE CLEANING AND GROUT SEALING! Paid for tile cleaning and grout sealing. Crew had to come out 3 times in one day to attempt to fix and finish. First, they forgot to seal the shower that we paid $90 for them to do. Then, we noticed a film all over every single tile that would not come up; Technician did NOT allow the tile and grout to dry before spraying grout sealer..Then, did not wipe off the excess grout sealer, just left it all over each and every tile. 3rd trip out of same day to day to try and fix it, they used every chemical, scrubber machine, everything they had to try and get it off, guess what, didn't work. So now, my grout is wet UNDER the sealer, which never had proper curing time, because they did not let the grout dry before applying, and my tiles have giant stains, splotches, blobs all over every single one because they did not remove the sealer from the tile after spraying the grout. And on top of it, one of the technicians decided that no, all of my white grout was actually completely stained before they got here that's why it's dark (Not because it was wet, which was the case)..He ended up arguing with me and cursing at me. So corporate will be getting a call this afternoon. Floors look 10x worse than what they did before they were out. Mind you, this was over a $450 job.

name: Janet W
text: I am blown away at how amazing this company and it's employees are.  I had some damage to my ceramic tile and scheduled an appt over the internet.  The app said they were available at 8AM on Monday (and this was 8PM on Sunday.  I tried scheduling, thinking they would call and say they needed to set me up at another time.  Instead, I got a call at 8:10AM saying a team was on the way.  Dane and his partner were AWESOME.  They were worried that they would not be able to correct the damage I had done,  so Dane went into great detail about what to expect (he did not want me to be disappointed).  After much discussion, I told him to "go for it".  He did a superb job of fixing what I had messed up with his corrective cleaning technique.  He cleaned to rest of the floor sparking clean and fresh.  The results were much better than I expected and I am very happy with his hard work and diligence in making certain I was fully informed about potential upside and downside of the process.  It was quick, convenient and more than lived up to my expectations.  Would give this team and all of Stanley Steemer 10 stars if possible.

name: Darin Bashaw
text: Watch their pricing and get quotes. They are already 50% more than competition for normal service. Deodorant or other add-ons will double the price. And if you dare to ask for tile or other hard surface cleaning and the price will be triple what carpets would cost. I was shocked by that bill. Didn't make sense so I asked and couldn't get a satisfactory reason why the hard surfaces were so much more expensive, except 'that's our price, that's always been our price.' Well these prices just don't seem reasonable to me. Otherwise, can't fault the service. As a commercial company, we need affordable and predictable prices and find these elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi Darin, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. In an effort to stay competitive Stanley Steemer monitors various consumer reports to help determine how their pricing compares. Although our pricing may not always be lower than our competitors, we are confident that they cannot match our quality of service. We are forwarding your concerns along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office, that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this.

They checked out the areas to be cleaned, asked if we had any special concerns (which we did and they addressed) and they went right to work. name: Carli Parrish
text:
I just purchased a home and wanted the carpets cleaned before I moved my things into the home. I hired Stanley Steemer to come out on the day of closing. I could’ve rented a carpet cleaner from Publix and taken my time to clean my carpets and would’ve had a better result. I thought hiring professionals would save me time and I would have professionally cleaned carpets. Unfortunately that didn’t happen, they rushed and left dirty spots that I later cleaned myself. Not to mention they didn’t touch the areas around the base boards. I wasted over $300!
Update!
I received a call this morning and it’s was explained that my carpets had been neglected and that’s was why the carpets looked unclean. I really appreciate that fact that Stanley Steemer took the time to respond to my complaint!

resp.text: Hi Carli, thank you for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are forwarding this information along to the managers at the local Stanley Steemer office that way if for some reason they are not already aware of it they can look into this matter and contact you directly. We have located your account information, to ensure we are contacting the correct location. Please email us at customerrelations@steemer.com (mailto:customerrelations@steemer.com) if you have any further questions or concerns. Once again, we do apologize for any inconvenience this has caused you and we look forward to looking into this as quickly as possible. Thank you again for choosing Stanley Steemer.

text: Every time I have been to Royal Fine Cleaners, they have been nothing short of professional. The service when you walk in the door is impeccable, and I feel like family every time I go in. text: Royal Cleaners is the best dry cleaning service in town! I had left a suit there over a year and they held on to it! Also wasn’t charged any extra fees. Fast, friendly, and professional!

name: Katherine Webster
text: I love this dry cleaner! They always have my clothes done by the next business day, and their prices are extremely reasonable. I've been coming to this location for about a year, and I can't recommend it enough.

name: Kim Hawkins
text: This cleaners is the worst place for alterations! Do not use them! They took over a month to put in a zipper on a skirt. They originally said it would be $24 and then charged $25. Yeah, I know it's just a dollar, but they should be giving me a discount for my troubles, definitely not charging more. The guy said they send alterations out to a company that does high volume and isn't interested in doing one skirt-- would have been nice to know that over a month ago, buddy.

name: Alex Lee
text: Friendly staff, and my clothes always done well

name: Andrew Godfrey
text:
They cleaned the carpets and they look better than they have vs any other service that has cleaned here. Having said that...

The technician/salesman will show up and try to sell you a ton of services that they will give you a great deal on because they are your friend. Decline all of it. The enzyme treatment, pretreatment, post treatment, etc.seem to largely be imaginary. I signed up for some but they did not modify what they were doing at all.

Also they will not move or clean under any piece of furniture that you do not EXPLICITLY ask them to clean under, so keep an eye on the work and speak up; they wont do anything they don't absolutely have to on their own.

Having said all of that, the carpets look great.

name: Rey D
text: Came up to my mother in laws in Daphne and needed to get the house taken care of before we sell it.  Rugs need to be cleaned, sofa and most important the duct work cleaned out.  We called Stanley Steamer of Daphne, what a great deal.  We are so happy with the work the two brothers did to the house.  Both Chris and Dustin did an outstanding job not only with the rugs but the air duct work did wonders.  The air is cleaner and just feels great. Definitely recommend these guys, not only professional but friendly and down to earth.  Great guys and great deal!!

name: Chris Thomason
text: We had quite a few pet issues in the carpet and the guys came out and used a special cleaner on the areas and it got rid of all the spots and smells! Very friendly and knowledgeable. Worth calling these guys out. I added before and after pictures!

text:
I was very pleased with the service, the professional knowledge and equipment, and friendly courtesy of the two men who came to my house.
I did upgrade the cleaning technique and add a protective treatment after the cleaning to sustain the good results.  These were good recommendations given the condition and traffic patterns of my carpet.
I won't wait 3 years again to call them!  I sincerely recommend them.

text: Chris came to clean my carpets. The company was extremely Covid-19 friendly, and he exercised extreme caution and professionalism. The carpet was heavily soiled with older stains, and they did an amazing job getting everything cleaned. He explained the process, and even altered my service because I had ordered a process that was not needed for my carpet type. He saved me money! I will be calling them again soon on my other properties.

text: Stanley Steemer is not cheap, but we were looking at the prospect of replacing all the carpet in a home we just bought. They came in and made it look like it was nearly new. They just went under new ownership and the guys showed up in a brand new truck with top notch equipment. Friendly service that I would recommend to anyone. They saved us thousands.

Thank you!!

text: Very impressed with new management! They took great care of us over the phone and left our carpets looking and smelling great!  Big deal considering we have 3 large dogs!

text:
I have nothing but compliments for the Stanley Steemer team that came to my house today. I woke up to the fact that my German Short Hair decided to mark my loft banisters which meant it went alllll over the top and the bottom floor. Apparently he snuck up there before because when I went up to see what happened there were dried set stains. It was a mess.
It was about 10:30 when I called Stanley Steamer. Chris and Dustin were here by this afternoon and unbelievably got every single gross mark out of my upstairs carpeting and even cleaned the rug underneath for me. AND my house smells so good.
They explained the process, let me review what they felt should be done to take care of the problem and did a fantastic job.
Very personable clean cut guys who know their business.
Thank you for a very positive experience.

name: Andrea Lynn
text: Chris n Aiden cleaned carpet, n did a very good job.... Carpet looks 👍🏾

name: Chris Thomason
text: Under new ownership and striving to provide the best customer service and results to the Mobile Alabama area! Give us a shot if you havent already!

name: Patty Gillis
text: Stanley Steemer came out to do a few rooms.  It looked good until it dried.  They graciously came back out and commented that the "streaks in the carpet, possibly due to clogged jet during initial cleaning" and cleaned the problem area again.  Note that we do have pets/pet stains, but the streaks are still visible and in different places the same width of the equipment they used.  We gave Stanley Steemer a try and think we will go back to another carpet cleaning service.

name: Jeared Layton
text: Didn’t move furniture as promised, didn’t clean under rugs, didn’t do a closet they were asked to do. Won’t give a refund. I had family coming in the next day and rented a cleaner and cleaned it at midnight. I called to complain, the manager won’t call me back and the lady on the phone was rude!

name: TAMMY McCLOSKEY
text: Prices to high

name: Ryan Baker
text: I've used Stanley steemers multiple times and they always meet or exceed my expectations. Great work at a great price!

text: Austin and Jimmy cleaned our carpets today and the wife and I are very pleased with the outcome. We will be using them again

name: jesse hazwood
text: Very good work.

name: David Coffman
text: Great 👍

name: Nikki Harwell
text: The staff was very friendly.

name: Jane Nall
text: It is Monday 3 pm and no one answers phone and equipment is not allowing me to leave message.

name: Mike Winchester
text: Superb job by Heaven’s Best Carpet Cleaning.  Irvin and Frederick were highly punctual, pleasant, and professional.  They cleaned our four bedrooms/closets, and loft carpets and restored their newness.  We were prepared to write off and replace our master bedroom carpet but it came out looking great-even with 15 years of use and the occasional pet accident.  Thanks also to Miss Rochelle who scheduled the booking. The company demonstrates trust and integrity.

resp.text: Clean Supreme with our Heaven's Best Carpet Cleaning department, wants to  thank you for allowing our team to save your carpet.

name: Bryan Brazelle
text: Courtney and her team went above and beyond to make sure that the house that we were about to put on the market was exceptionally clean! Attention to detail was very impressive. Highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  We loved working on your beautiful home.

name: T J
text: I found Courtney and her team at Supreme Clean LLC, a Veteran owned and operated business, to be Extremely Responsive and Professional. I had to change my appointment several times due to schedule and Courtney was very understanding. The team provided a Quality Cleaning for my property which I was having detailed cleaned between tenants.  They even went further to follow up the next day on some grout cleaning to ensure that it looked good after it dried.  Thank you Supreme Clean for your hard work!

resp.text: You're welcome and thank you for choosing  Clean Supreme 😊

name: Robert Pierce
text: The absolute best carpet service. Very professional, prompt and excellent service. I have used them many times at several different houses and they are the best!

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to care for your carper.

name: Monique Harris
text: Clean Supreme provided me with the best service  I have ever experienced. From the minute Courtney answered the phone I was met with  great customer service. I cannot say enough about this business.  We had the unique situation of having rodents in our vehicle (yuck). Until I found Clean Supreme, burning the car was the only option. Because of the situation, regular detailing was not sufficient for us. We needed someone with experience in this area. After talking with her she immediately reassured me that she could take care of the problem, since she has experience with rodent infestations in hoarder situations. She was  knowledgeable, professional, and the service was spotless. I would certainly utilize this business again for any cleaning need.  If there was an option to give 6 out of 5 stars I would do it.

resp.text: Thank you so much. We definately wanted you yo have a pleasant experience from an unpleasant situation.

name: Alex Williams
text: Absolutely great Cleaning and service!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ They did a fantastic job and left my carpets looking amazing. They were professional and super nice! Thank you for handling the rugs and the puppie accidents that needed attention! Great job overall experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.  We wish you and the puppy well. If ever you need us again, we hope to satisfy you.

name: Tess Healey
text: Crew did an amazing job. Recommend for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing our services.  We look forward to working with you on a long-term basis.

name: Light House Cleaning Company LLC
text: Very Professional!! Awesome Customer Service I HIRED THE CLEAN SUPREME Permanently for My company. Also they have the most responsible rates around town

resp.text: That you Ms. Jemison. It was a pleasure serving you.

name: Pollie Wells
text:
Clean Supreme is an excellent cleaning service! Courtney and her team are thorough, honest, and a pleasure to work with! My first point of contact was with Rochelle. She always returned my phone calls and answered all my questions in a prompt and professional manner. We accessed all of their cleaning tools which included a complete cleaning of every surface from top to bottom (even windows inside and out), Heavens Best Carpet Cleaning, and the ionization odor removing process. Courtney went above and beyond to make sure our house was sparkling clean and fresh and ready to put on the market! I can’t say enough about these wonderful ladies!
If your looking for an honest and thorough cleaning service for a great price look no further than Clean Supreme!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Pollie for allowing us to be of service.

name: Camille Kibler
text: I have used this company for the last 6 years to clean my commercial properties and I am VERY satisfied with the quality of their work! They are my ONLY choice for cleaning services.

resp.text: Thank you for allowing us to be your vendors. May we continue to give you a 5 star cleaning of all of your establishments

name: MaryLou Dawson
text: Best cleaning team I've ever had; hands down ;professional, friendly.  Go above and beyond. I'd hire them again anytime.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Mary Lou. We appreciate your business. Hoping all is well.

text: Southern Tide Services provides excellent cleaning services.  They do a great job and Blake always follows up to ensure that we are pleased with their performance.   We highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Making sure our clients are happy is what makes our work so rewarding.

name: Kristen Kacker
text: This company has been a pleasure to work with! They are very professional and thorough. We will continue to use their cleaning services!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We really appreciate the chance to get to work for great clients like you.

name: Laura Dover
text: We have been using Southern Tides for a few months now and are pleased with our weekly cleaning service. Blake and his crew are awesome!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience. We truly appreciate the opportunity to work for you and your company!

name: Norman C Hahn
text: Friendly, great communication throughout the entire process.  Easy scheduling and excellent pricing.

resp.text: I'm sorry Norman but I'm unable to find any record that you have been a client of ours now or in the past. Perhaps this review was made on the wrong business.

name: Lucky Bird Vacations
text: Southern Tide Services are wonderful! In addition to just being all around amazing people. They take their time, always do their best, and go above and beyond for our vacation rental units. We highly recommend these guys!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words! We truly appreciate the opportunity to get to work for great clients like you and look forward to doing business together for years to come.

name: Ray Lee
text: Communicated through out the process. Provided a written estimate.  Showed up on time was efficient and did a great job.  Very happy with the service.  Polite and Professional.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this excellent review. We really appreciate your business and are happy to help. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: Scott Wylie
text: They came out on very short notice and did an absolutely phenomenal job, I will definitely use them again and would strongly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review! We work hard to make sure our clients and guests are pleased with our services, and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Hope you enjoy the rest of your stay and if we can ever be of service again please let us know!
